attributes.action: We the British people call for a vote of no confidence in the current Administration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After continuous failures, uturns, failed policies and  discriminatory policies (against anyone without Children) we the British people have had enough.  We call on the government to accept a vote of no confidence from the electorate.  This petition of course will not be approved by this government run website - Trust me if its not I will  be checking to make sure it appears on the rejected part of the website and will want to know why.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
